title: Need help with new client update
body: I accidently hit do later as I was playing in Japanese, (im not Jap) just love the sounds, was wondering how I can still upgrade, can anyone help me? Cheers

replies.body: how did you get Japanese in oce. They only ever offered us english.
In the config file, my bro did it yesterday as soon as the patch finished, works fine :), but i need to know how to update to the new one as i accidently hit do it later
top right box before you press launch should have it
Cheers man, do u want me to tell you how to change language?
